Developer Terms of Use
des:
Momentum Secure is the smart home solution that lets you watch over your home from anywhere as long as you have access to the internet. Use the Momentum Secure skill to manage all your Momentum devices. Simply enable the Momentum Skill in the Alexa App and link your Alexa and Momentum Secure accounts to get started.

To view a live feed from your Momentum camera, say:
“Alexa, show the front door.”

To stop your Momentum secure feed, say:
“Alexa, go home.”
“Alexa, stop.”

Alexa can notify you when your Momentum Smart Cameras detect motion. 

The Momentum Secure Skill connects your Momentum Codi camera, Teri Wire-Free Battery Camera, and Niro2 Garage Door Opener to your Echo Show, Echo Show 5, Echo Show 8, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers, Fire Tablets and Fire TV. The skill is compatible with all generations of Fire TV, the second-generation Fire TV Stick, all Fire TV Edition Smart TVs and Fire Tablets Gen 7 and above.

Please note: Momentum Secure skill only supports devices linked to a primary user's account, not shared devices.
